sys_script_include.name: isDateToday

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_046e2bcb2ff8b0106ac7265df699b6bc
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.isDateToday</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>isDateToday</name><script><![CDATA[var isDateToday = Class.create();
isDateToday.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	isDateToday: function(strDate){
		
		// Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
		// Get the date portion of rightnow and testdate (no timestamp)
		var today = rightnow.getLocalDate();
		var istoday = testdate.getLocalDate();
	
		// Compare today and istoday to see if they are the same day
		if(today.compareTo(istoday) == 0){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	},

    type: 'isDateToday'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-22 07:26:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>046e2bcb2ff8b0106ac7265df699b6bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>isDateToday</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_046e2bcb2ff8b0106ac7265df699b6bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-22 07:50:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
